pageContext.claim: “It’s shameful that dems and the media exploited this photo of a little girl to push their agenda. She was not separated from her mom. The separation here is from the facts. Dems should join POTUS and fix our broken immigration system. #ChangetheLaws”
pageContext.analysis: In fact, families are being separated because of a "zero tolerance" policy from the Trump administration dating to April 2018. No law, whether passed by Democrats or otherwise, requires these separations. Essentially, Trump's executive order just retracted his own policy, which he could have reversed without an order.
